s.text: Or, instead, we could just wait for a war and use 20-year-olds as guinea pigs in a poorly researched social experiment.
I'd say that any downside to sexually integrating nonmilitary workplaces is not severe enough to restrict the rights of women (or men).
I'd say that any downside to sexually integrating nonmilitary workplaces is not severe enough to restrict the rights of women (or men).

The warless !Kung San hunter-gatherers of the Kalahari Desert, once romanticized as The Harmless People , were found a few decades ago to have homicide rates between 20 and 80 times as high as industrialized nations.

The warless !Kung San hunter-gatherers of the Kalahari Desert, once romanticized as The Harmless People , were found a few decades ago to have homicide rates between 20 and 80 times as high as industrialized nations.
Hoping (even subconsciously) that one of your comrades will die seems a poor frame of mind to carry into battle.
Careful thought experiments have shown that, in a context of regular violence, mental traits conducive to killing would do more for your genes than mental traits conducive to getting killed would.
And whether or not our distant male ancestors often participated in actual "war," they probably fought other males and sometimes killed them.
It's not just a question of men disinclined to violence getting killed off.
Careful thought experiments have shown that, in a context of regular violence, mental traits conducive to killing would do more for your genes than mental traits conducive to getting killed would.
Careful thought experiments have shown that, in a context of regular violence, mental traits conducive to killing would do more for your genes than mental traits conducive to getting killed would.

Careful thought experiments have shown that, in a context of regular violence, mental traits conducive to killing would do more for your genes than mental traits conducive to getting killed would.
Careful thought experiments have shown that, in a context of regular violence, mental traits conducive to killing would do more for your genes than mental traits conducive to getting killed would.

However, male dominance of the killing business seems to have been going on for a lot longer than a few centuries--maybe long enough to have influenced human evolution, shaping the biological foundation of human psychology.
But history has provided few candidates for that job.

But history has provided few candidates for that job.
Sexually integrating ground combat forces is now favored by one assistant secretary of the Army.
Here we come to a problem that will prove stubborn if the military tries to sexually integrate ground combat forces such as the infantry.
And already combat forces are somewhat integrated in the Air Force (squadrons of pilots) and Navy (ship crews).

Sexually integrating ground combat forces is now favored by one assistant secretary of the Army.
And already combat forces are somewhat integrated in the Air Force (squadrons of pilots) and Navy (ship crews).
But the underlying psychological forces will still be there, taking their toll.
One can imagine combat roles for women that wouldn't fly in the face of human nature.
(Why not try ?) But reflecting on human nature doesn't seem to be a common pastime at the Pentagon.
Male combat is common among primates.
